content: Great, better than paper and pen. Wish I could enter box dimensions so it could calculate cuft
Great üëç
I have found this ideal when moving. Although i have had some issues with backing up that were entirely an issue related to my phone. The technical support I've received has been brilliant.

Used successfully for one move and uninstalled. Recently installed again and added another move with 10 boxes. Uninstalled by mistake and now that I installed again all my data for second move is GONE! Extremely disappointed!
replyContent: Hello Lilia - sorry that you lost your data - but if you uninstalled the app, the data will be deleted. Did you link to Dropbox and make a backup before uninstalling? If so you may be able to restore the data from Dropbox.

content: Awesome to use
Very useful and intuitive. Lets you snap a quick photo of the box and verbally list the contents for easy searching later (paid version). Love it!
Easy to use, quick retrieve of information. I will like to see an update on the photo section. Able to Zoom the Photos.

I love this app! It works beautifully! My last move, 15 years ago, I wrote everything down in every box, numbered and labeled. This does the same, using my voice plus pictures if the contents. Quick and very efficient. Unpacking will be a breeze. I have the pro version, using an Android. Thank you for making this move easier!

Easy to use, keeps things tidy and functions exactly how I hoped it to. Well worth the small charge for the Pro version. As a super planner and organizer this has been a dream come true for my move. One recommendation to the designer, more ways to sort the boxes would be great. (Ex. Ascending/descending order of box#) No complaints, just a little extra oil for almost inaudible squeaking.
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback and the suggestion! Yes ascending/descending will be a nice feature to implement. We will put this in the plan for our next version for sure!

content: Genius simple smart app
Easy to use and useful
Awesome and perfect. This app is keeping my move so organized and I love it.
Very nice and easy to use. Wish you could attach multiple pictures to a single box though.
For now, i m loving it. Does exactly what I need : name boxes, take pictures, specify location... GREAT JOB!

The app is precisely what you want: a box inventory solution for moving. It allows you to easily list contents, take pictures, and print and track labels. I like the cloud *backup* feature but would give this a 5-star all day long if it included cloud *sync*. To "sync" between devices, only one can really be in use at any one time - you must backup a move (and box list) on device A, then restore on device B and only use that device to add or modify boxes. For that updated move to be updated on Device A, then, Device B must backup to the cloud and then Device A must restore. It would be far far better if moves would sync. Other than that - precisely what i was looking for.
Great, very useful when moving. Now using to keep track of boxes in the attic. Only thing it misses is automatic (rather than manual) backup to Dropbox.
The best inventory app I have found. The pro version is well worth it.
Definitely worth the dollar I paid! Versatile, super easy to use, love that it can be backed up and shared between devices!
This app is just what I needed to organise the boxes when moving house! üëç

Just what I needed and simple to use. I use this app to keep inventory of our things stored in boxes in our garage. It has helped us reduce clutter and most of all it takes the guess work out of looking for things we stored away. Thank you developers for this great app!

this is second time I am using this app..this time, I actually am able to do a real multi user move. I noticed, I can backup and restore from dropbox. but the app creates s new backup file with timestamp. if I am packing downstairs with phone a and do a backup, I get file 1 created. a person doing packing on another floor with another phone will add his boxes and backup. they create new file..instead, if there is a merge feature like a version control software, having millions backup files can be
replyContent: Thanks so much for the feedback. The app does have multi-device sync. Its more like multi-device data exchange but the way it works is you link all 3 devices to the same dropbox account. Then you can backup from one device, and restore from another. This works cross platform as well. Thanks!

content: Easy to use. The app is pretty easy to follow. Instead of asking for cubic volume of box let me put in the dimensions so it can generate that and determine what size box and volume. I do not know what a basic vox is?
Nightmare move from 3 bedroom / 2 bath to 1BR/1B & Garage Shortage Unit, made easier...Awesome!!!
Very useful, especially for keeping tabs on the volume of boxes you will be moving
Great help

Backup and restore doesn't work. Backup says it backed up successfully, but when i restore it, everything is wiped away. Tried Dropbox same device and others with same result. Got a refund. Edit: kudos that the developer responded, but i have since moved on to another app, as i don't have time to help debugging - I'm preparing for a move. Added a star to account for the follow-up.
replyContent: Can you please email us at support@smartrfsolutions.com so we can figure out what exactly is causing this issue? We do backups and restores all the time so this is definitely one of our most tested features.

content: easy to use, motivated me add boxes to see totals climb

I went with Pro! 99 cents? Pocket change. Anyway, before mentioning anything else, I must say that this is awesome. No, I'm not affiliated with SmartRF nor is this a fake review. I just find it refreshing to find an app that actually works and the programmer caring about it's quality. Without ANY instruction, I was able to dive in and use it. Some previous suggestions had already been included and this makes it even nicer. I did a test printout of the few boxes I have so far and it is, again, awesome. Everything works and I have had no crashes on my Pixel XL. I would like to see... a little better picture quality and at least be able to include 2 pictures instead of one. I created a Dropbox account because I didn't have one but it would have been more convenient to use my Google Drive to backup the file to. Keep up the good work!
Great app. Must have for organizing the boxes when moving.

Has potential. I would like to see an export or move option to move boxes between moves categories. I have multiple storage locations and I move the boxes between them while sorting out things that are going to my new house,.my shop, my office, and storage. My new house is out of state.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We just published an update to the app with the feature you suggested. Now you can copy boxes from one move to another just by long pressing and selecting the copy action.

content: Very useful, organized and works perfectly.

The search function works great and the voice function works good but could 
be better.

Terrific app. Has more uses than moving. I would like to have 2 additional 
functions. 1 - after naming a box have the box cubic feet auto fill. 2 - I 
would like the ability to move a box to another move. Great job.

We liked how you could search a packed item and find which box it was 
packed in. It was a better tool than if we had been without, but the list 
my husband had and mine weren't easily synchronized (my husband is in I.T. 
and didnt find the drop-box solution intuitive.) We also wished there was a 
way to email the list. The mover would have found it useful for unloading. 
Still, glad we had the app for the cross- country move.
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! The list of boxes can be emailed by going to Menu - Print from the box list, and selecting "Save as PDF." That PDF file can then be attached to an email. We'll try to make this process more intuitive in a future release.

content: Keeps count of number of boxes from each room

Just moved and I LOVE this app. I'm purposely being very slow to unpack, so 
it's great being able to search what box specific contents are in and only 
open the box I need when I need it. One thing I would have done differently 
is to take only pictures of the outside of the box, and be more descriptive 
about internal contents. I understand the single picture limitation, and I 
now realize that knowing what the outside of the box looks like is more 
helpful.

When you take a picture of items in your box that works fine. But you need to be able to take more than one picture of items for one box you cannot do that. Some of my moving boxes have more than one layer, if you can't take more than one picture per box. Then that makes it hard to show all content in one box.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! The single image was a design decision we made to keep the UI easy to use, and also to keep the data size small (images are stored in the database, so multiple images per box could make it large). One thing you can try is taking the picture while the box is open, and use the description field since you can search on that.

content: Works well. Would like to include some colour coding & a category for furniture so could record condition, esp for storage. Really good & time saving for the boxes & like the Dropbox link too
replyContent: Thanks so much for the feedback! You can actually use "Furniture" as a category - just type in Furniture in the category field, and it will appear as a drop-down for subsequent items. Color coding is a great idea - we'll look into implementing it in an upcoming version.

content: Very helpful and remarkably simple app. The recent updates are step in right direction. Further improvements I can suggest are 1 . Tick boxes to tick once loaded for moving and another to tick when received at other end. (May be in two interfaces for sending & receiving ) 2. Ability to insert customised prefix to box number.

Room for improvements - just started using this app. I don't normal leave reviews on apps I haven't been using for awhile, but there some areas in need of improvement. The location section should have drop down selections such as kitchen, bedroom 1, living room, etc. There could also be some drop down options for box content, such as dishes, cups, etc. I also wish I could copy the name of a box. For example, I don't want to keep typing in dvds 1, dvds 2,  dvds 3 etc if I have several boxes of dvds. This is very time consuming. I will continue to use the app for now, and will adjust my review if options improve.
replyContent: Thank you  for your feedback! We heard you - we just published an update to our app where we implemented some of your suggestions. Now you can have a dropdown of locations - and instead of us giving you the locations, you can just make them yourself. Once you create a location it will show up in dropdown for future boxes. Same with box types too!

content: Good app. Better if I can customize and save the type of box drop down window.  Also wish the location had a drop down window with Kitchen, Office etc or dictates option like the contents. Overall please.
replyContent: Hello Frances - we heard you! Just published an update to the app and now you can customize the dropdown window for box types. We also created a location dropdown with previous locations you have entered. Hope this helps, and thanks for using our app!

content: Have Pro version. AM in process of packing up and moving, this app is ideal for listing all my items in the boxes.  However, it won't let me save as a PDF file or print.  Have taken screen shots but none case I lose all the data.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your feedback! Saving to pdf is available in the Android Pro version - open a move, go to Menu-Print. At the top of the screen you can select a cloud print printer, or select "save to pdf" to create a PDF file. Contact us at support@smartrfsolutions.com if you need more help. Thank you for supporting this app!

content: great app does exactly what it says  go straight to pro version its worth it !
Fantastic app, made moving so much easier. Would definitely recommend to anyone trying to make moving less painful and frustrating. Kept things organized and easy to locate.
Works well, keeps things organized. Could use more features. Highly recommended.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We are always making improvements to our app, so if you have suggestions for new features, please let us know.

content: Easy to use, this almost perfect. I would've  liked  to add my custom box names to the drop down menu for box name and add a drop down menu for my locations I enter, to save me from having to retype it in for each box. after a while it gets cumbersome. Also I'd like to link to Google drive, I'm not a fan of Dropbox. Otherwise, it's a great app and happy to have it.
I have a Sony Experia Aqua. Your app says my device does not do voice recognition. How can I rectify? That is why I chose this app?
replyContent: Thank you so much for the report. We just tested the app on a Sony Xperia Ion, an older device than the Aqua and voice features worked fine. Can you please email us at support@smartrfsolutions.com and help identify the issue? Are you able to use voice recognition feature in other apps? Can you use the mic button for the box contents?

content: I downloaded this application 7 months ago when we were getting ready to move almost all of our stuff to storage. We moved into my in-laws while we were finding a house to buy. First, this app helped me find (without having to dig through 30 boxes) paperwork we needed for the mortgage company. Then, 7 months after packing when I'm FINALLY moving into my new home and long after I could even vaguely remember what box I had packed stuff in, this app has helped me find stuff quickly and keep track of things!!!
Too confusing
replyContent: Can you please elaborate what you found confusing? We continuously update the app and we would love to use your suggestions to make it less confusing.

content: I suggest making a pathway to a label printing app or develop it within this one.   Then the labels can be placed on the carton so delivery crew can easily identify where to set boxes.   That way I. Not moving cartons all over new home because they are in wrong room.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We do have a print feature but it prints the packing list to a printer (or pdf). Creating custom labels from Android may be a bit of work, but we will try to add a feature by which you can export a csv and use it with Word to make your own labels. Great suggestion!

content: A must have for moving. Easy to find which box items are packed in and even what the box looks like.
Great app. But you must to improve this app: more picture per box; add or delete tipe of box (standard box, product box, etc); send or print (to pdf)
replyContent: We heard you! We have added the print feature to the app so you can now print from the app to a pdf file or to a cloud-print enabled wireless printer. Please check it out!

content: I've used this app for two moves now and it helped me organize my pack, quickly know whether I had all of my things or not and helped me organize while unpacking. Use it! Do it! You'll love it.
Suggest update to app
replyContent: Hello this feature is actually supported in this version. To access the list from more than one device, simply link to Dropbox in the device you create your boxes, perform a backup. In other devices, link to the same dropbox account, and then restore your boxes. See http://www.smartrfsolutions.com/srfs/movingcompanion for more info. Thanks!

content: Paid money for this app and it constantly crashes on me!
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and reporting the crash. We just published an update to this app that should fix this issue. We would appreciate it if you would update your rating if this fixes the problem.
